r.s: Package to represent and manipulate integers
r.d: The class Math_Integer can represent integers bigger than the signed longs that are the default of PHP, if either the GMP or the BCMATH (bundled with PHP) are present. Otherwise it will fall back to the internal integer representation. The Math_IntegerOp class defines operations on Math_Integer objects.
r.n: Fixed bug with BCMATH driver BC break: clone() method renamed to makeClone() Unit test coverage compatible with PHPUnit 3.4+ QA release Bug #3672 Error in sqrt() Bug #883 PEAR QA: improvement for get_class()-usage
